synopsis.text: Shop ping for a job, Kautz stumbles upon an unconventional armor store specializing in risqu√© attire for female warriors. Based on a popular 4-panel manga, "Armor Shop for Ladies & Gentlemen" follows Kautz's hilarious and titillating journey as he takes on the challenge of saving the struggling business, while indulging in the eye-catching clientele. As he navigates the eccentric world of adult armor sales, Kautz discovers there's more to this shop than meets the eye, and perhaps, more to his own motivations as well. Prepare for a wild ride in this ecchi comedy that explores the tantalizing side of the adventurer's world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
